front.title: Using GOST 28147-89 with IPsec Encapsulating Security Payload (ESP)

abstract.t: This document defines the usage of GOST 28147-89 algorithm when providing data integrity and confidentiality in ESP protocol. The contents of this document is technically equivalent to its TC26 ROSSTANDART specification. This specification is maintained by TC26 ROSSTANDART and further updates are available at: http://www.tc26.ru/.
